turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I want to order a coffee at Peet's Coffee and espresso beverages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which peet's should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One in San Antonio College. I mean, San Antonio, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. and what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to order a golden caffe latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I wanted to add coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. so the order was 1 large iced golden cafe latte with coconut milk from peet's in san antonio texas. is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Are there any other flavors I can add into that drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, the syrups available at peet's are Vanilla, Sugar-free vanilla, Maple, Hazelnut, Sugar-free chocolate sauce, and Cinnabon Bun.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I add some barn into my latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. so the order has been modified. 1 large iced golden cafe latte with cinnabon bun syrup and coconut milk from peet's in san antonio texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.50 is the total. should i process the payment now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order has been submitted. it'll be ready for pick up in 10 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the receipt has been sent to you via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nah, that's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, take care.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: See you.
